   19: %%
   20: -module(ssl_upgrade_SUITE).
   21: 
   22: -behaviour(ct_suite).
   23: 
   24: -include("ssl_test_lib.hrl").
   25: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   26: 
   27: %% Common test
   28: -export([all/0,
   29:          init_per_suite/1,
   30:          init_per_testcase/2,
   31:          end_per_suite/1,
   32:          end_per_testcase/2,
   33:          upgrade_init/2,
   34:          upgrade_upgraded/2,
   35:          upgrade_downgraded/2]).
   36: 
   37: %% Test cases
   38: -export([minor_upgrade/1,
   39:          major_upgrade/1]).
   40: 
   41: %% spawn/apply export
   42: -export([result_proxy_init/1, use_connection/1]).
   43: 
   44: 
   45: -record(state, {
   46: 	  config,
   47: 	  server,
   48: 	  client,
   49: 	  soft,
   50: 	  result_proxy,
   51: 	  skip
   52: 	 }).
   53: 
   54: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   55: %% Common Test interface functions -----------------------------------
   56: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   57: 
   58: all() -> 
   59:     [
   60:      minor_upgrade,
   61:      major_upgrade
   62:     ].
   63: 
   64: init_per_suite(Config0) ->
   65:     catch application:stop(crypto),
   66:     try application:start(crypto) of
   67:         ok ->
   68:             ssl_test_lib:clean_start(),
   69:             case ct_release_test:init(Config0) of
   70:                 {skip, Reason} ->
   71:                     {skip, Reason};
   72:                 Config ->
   73:                     ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_cert(Config)
   74:             end
   75:     catch _:_ ->
   76:               {skip, "Crypto did not start"}
   77:     end.
   78: 
   79: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   80:     ct_release_test:cleanup(Config),
   81:     application:stop(crypto).
   82: 
   83: init_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
   84:     ssl_test_lib:ct_log_supported_protocol_versions(Config),
   85:     ct:timetrap({minutes, 1}),
   86:     Config.
   87: 
   88: end_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->     
   89:     Config.
   90: 
   91: upgrade_init(CtData, State) -> 
   92:     {ok,{FromVsn,ToVsn}} = ct_release_test:get_app_vsns(CtData, ssl),
   93:     upgrade_init(FromVsn, ToVsn, CtData, State).
   94: 
   95: upgrade_upgraded(_, #state{skip = true} = State) ->
   96:     State;
   97: upgrade_upgraded(_, #state{soft = false, config = Config, result_proxy = Pid} = State) ->
   98:     ?CT_PAL("Restart upgrade ~n", []),
   99:     {Server, Client} = restart_start_connection(Config, Pid),
  100:     Result = check_result(Pid, Server, Client),
  101:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  102:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client),
  103:     ok = Result,
  104:     State;
  105: upgrade_upgraded(_, #state{server = Server0, client = Client0,
  106: 			   config = Config, soft = true,
  107: 			   result_proxy = Pid} = State) ->
  108:     ?CT_PAL("Soft upgrade: ~n", []),
  109:     Server0 ! changed_version,
  110:     Client0 ! changed_version,
  111:     Result = check_result(Pid, Server0, Client0),
  112:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server0),
  113:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client0),
  114:     ok = Result,
  115:     {Server, Client} = soft_start_connection(Config, Pid),
  116:     State#state{server = Server, client = Client}.
  117: 
  118: upgrade_downgraded(_, #state{skip = true} = State) ->
  119:     State;
  120: upgrade_downgraded(_, #state{soft = false, config = Config, result_proxy = Pid} = State) ->
  121:     ?CT_PAL("Restart downgrade: ~n", []),
  122:     {Server, Client} = restart_start_connection(Config, Pid),
  123:     Result = check_result(Pid, Server, Client),
  124:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  125:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client),
  126:     Pid ! stop,
  127:     ok = Result,
  128:     State;
  129: upgrade_downgraded(_, #state{server = Server, client = Client, soft = true, result_proxy = Pid} = State) ->
  130:     ?CT_PAL("Soft downgrade: ~n", []),
  131:     Server ! changed_version,
  132:     Client ! changed_version,
  133:     Result = check_result(Pid, Server, Client),
  134:     Pid ! stop,
  135:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  136:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client),
  137:     ok = Result,
  138:     State.
  139: 
  140: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  141: %% Test Cases --------------------------------------------------------
  142: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  143: major_upgrade(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  144:     ct_release_test:upgrade(ssl, major,{?MODULE, #state{config = Config}}, Config).
  145: 
  146: minor_upgrade(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  147:     ct_release_test:upgrade(ssl, minor,{?MODULE, #state{config = Config}}, Config).
  148: 
  149: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  150: %% Internal functions ------------------------------------------------
  151: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  152: upgrade_init(Ver, Ver, _, State) ->
  153:     %% No upgrade if to and from version is the same!
  154:     State#state{skip = true};
  155: upgrade_init(_, "8.0.2", _, State) ->
  156:     %% Requires stdlib upgrade so it will be a node upgrade!
  157:     State#state{skip = true};
  158: upgrade_init(_, _, CtData, #state{config = Config} = State) ->
  159:     {ok, {_, _, Up, _Down}} = ct_release_test:get_appup(CtData, ssl),
  160:     ?CT_PAL("Up: ~p", [Up]),
  161:     Soft = is_soft(Up), %% It is symmetrical, if upgrade is soft so is downgrade
  162:     Pid = spawn(?MODULE, result_proxy_init, [[]]),
  163:     case Soft of
  164: 	true ->
  165: 	    {Server, Client} = soft_start_connection(Config, Pid),
  166: 	    State#state{server = Server, client = Client,
  167: 			soft = Soft,
  168: 			result_proxy = Pid};
  169: 	false ->
  170: 	    State#state{soft = Soft, result_proxy = Pid}
  171:     end.
  172: 
  173: use_connection(Socket) ->
  174:     ssl_test_lib:send_recv_result_active(Socket),
  175:     receive 
  176: 	changed_version ->
  177: 	    ssl_test_lib:send_recv_result_active(Socket)
  178:     end.
  179: 
  180: soft_start_connection(Config, ResulProxy) ->
  181:     ClientOpts = proplists:get_value(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  182:     ServerOpts = proplists:get_value(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  183:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  184:     Server = start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  185: 			   {from, ResulProxy},
  186: 			   {mfa, {?MODULE, use_connection, []}},
  187: 			   {options, ServerOpts}]),
  188:     
  189:     Port = inet_port(ResulProxy, Server),
  190:     Client = start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  191: 			   {host, Hostname},
  192: 			   {from, ResulProxy},
  193: 			   {mfa, {?MODULE, use_connection, []}},
  194: 			   {options, ClientOpts}]),
  195:     {Server, Client}.
  196: 
  197: restart_start_connection(Config, ResulProxy) ->
  198:     ClientOpts = proplists:get_value(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  199:     ServerOpts = proplists:get_value(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  200:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  201:     Server = start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  202: 					{from, ResulProxy},
  203: 					{mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
  204: 					{options, ServerOpts}]),
  205:     Port = inet_port(ResulProxy, Server),
  206:     Client = start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  207: 					{host, Hostname},
  208: 					{from, ResulProxy},
  209: 					{mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
  210: 					{options, ClientOpts}]),
  211:     {Server, Client}.
  212: 
  213: is_soft([{restart_application, ssl}]) ->	       
  214:     false;
  215: is_soft(_) ->	
  216:     true.
  217: 
  218: result_proxy_init(Args) ->
  219:     result_proxy_loop(Args).
  220: 
  221: result_proxy_loop(Args) ->
  222:     receive
  223: 	{Pid, {check_result, Server, Client}} ->
  224: 	    Result = do_check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
  225: 	    Pid ! {self(), Result},
  226: 	    result_proxy_loop(Args);
  227: 	{Pid, port, Server} ->
  228: 	    Port = recv_port(Server),
  229: 	    Pid ! Port,
  230: 	    result_proxy_loop(Args);
  231: 	{Pid, listen} ->
  232: 	    recv_listen(),
  233: 	    Pid ! ok,
  234: 	    result_proxy_loop(Args);
  235: 	{Pid, connected} ->
  236: 	    Connected = recv_connected(),
  237: 	     Pid ! Connected,
  238: 	    result_proxy_loop(Args)
  239:     end.
  240: 
  241: check_result(Pid, Server, Client) ->
  242:     Pid ! {self(), {check_result, Server, Client}},
  243:     receive
  244: 	{Pid, Result} ->
  245: 	    Result
  246:     end.
  247: 
  248: do_check_result(Server, ServerMsg, Client, ClientMsg) ->
  249:     receive
  250: 	{Server, ServerMsg} ->
  251: 	    do_check_result(Client, ClientMsg);
  252: 
  253: 	{Client, ClientMsg} ->
  254: 	    do_check_result(Server, ServerMsg);
  255: 	Unexpected ->
  256: 	    {{expected, {Client, ClientMsg}},
  257: 	     {expected, {Server, ServerMsg}}, {got, Unexpected}}
  258:     end.
  259: 
  260: do_check_result(Pid, Msg) ->
  261:     receive
  262: 	{Pid, Msg} ->
  263: 	    ok;
  264: 	Unexpected ->
  265: 	    {{expected, {Pid, Msg}},
  266: 	     {got, Unexpected}}
  267:     end.
  268: 
  269: inet_port(Pid, Server) ->
  270:     Pid ! {self(), port, Server},
  271:     receive
  272: 	{port, Port} ->
  273: 	    Port
  274:     end.
  275: 
  276: recv_port(Server) ->
  277:     receive
  278: 	{Server, {port, Port}} ->
  279: 	    {port, Port}
  280:     end.
  281: 
  282: recv_connected() ->
  283:     receive
  284: 	{connected, _Socket} ->
  285: 	    ok;
  286: 	{connect_failed, Reason} ->
  287: 	    {connect_failed, Reason}
  288:     end.
  289: 
  290: 
  291: start_server(Args) ->
  292:     Pid = proplists:get_value(from, Args),
  293:     Result = spawn_link(ssl_test_lib, run_server, [Args]),
  294:     Pid ! {self(), listen},
  295:     receive
  296: 	ok ->
  297: 	    ok
  298:     end,
  299:     Result.
  300: 
  301: start_client(Args) ->
  302:     Pid = proplists:get_value(from, Args),
  303:     Result = spawn_link(ssl_test_lib, run_client_init, [lists:delete(return_socket, Args)]),
  304:     Pid  ! {self(), connected},
  305:     receive
  306: 	ok ->
  307: 	    Result;
  308: 	Reason ->
  309: 	    exit(Reason)
  310:     end.
  311: 
  312: recv_listen()->
  313:     receive
  314: 	{listen, up} ->
  315: 	    ok
  316:     end.
